item.title: MIUI OS1.0.11.0.UNICNXM Fastboot update for MIX Flip China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: MIX Flip China

Codename: ruyi

Version: OS1.0.11.0.UNICNXM | 14.0

Size: 9.0 GB

MD5: 760cd46b370ecfbc0656159724c4c62b

Changelog:
[System]
New: Notification spotlights for ride hailing, food delivery, and one-time passwords on outer screen
New: Open apps using widgets on outer screen
New: Outer screen support for Xiaomi Home and Anipop
Optimization: System stability
Optimization: Typing in Dark mode on outer screen
Optimization: WeChat and Douyin support for outer screen
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Fix: Switching between apps on outer screen rebooted the device
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.

Download: Here
